treasury.title: Network Treasury
treasury.description: Explore how the total value, the assets and the asset type distribution in the Kolektivo Network Treasury are evolving over time.

assets.title: Treasury Assets
assets.tooltip: Explore all assets in the Treasury and their transactions.

value.title: Treasury Value
value.tooltip: Treasury Value is the total value of all the assets held by the treasury expressed in USD.

value-by-asset-type.title: Value by Asset Type
value-by-asset-type.tooltip: The distribution of each Asset Type held by the Treasury.

value-over-time.title: Treasury Value Over Time
value-over-time.tooltip: The ratio between Treasury and Reserve tokens over time.

governance.description: Explore all proposals and submit your Monetary policy proposals for the global Kolektivo Network.
governance.title: Kolektivo Network Governance

submit-card.title: Submit Proposal
submit-card.tooltip: Submit a proposal for the Kolektivo Network Treasury.

proposals-card.title: Proposals
proposals-card.tooltip: Explore ongoing and past governance proposals. Check which ongoing proposals are pending veto and which are ready to be executed.

overview.title: Kolektivo Curaçao Reserve
overview.description: Explore how the total value, the assets and the asset type distribution in the Kolektivo Curaçao Reserve are evolving over time.

value.title: Reserve Value
value.tooltip: The total value of all the assets held by the Reserve expressed in USD.

value-by-asset-type.title: Value by Asset Type
value-by-asset-type.tooltip: The distribution of each Asset Type held by the Reserve.

value-over-time.title: Reserve Value Over Time
value-over-time.tooltip: The distribution of Reserve Value by risk class, over time.

assets.title: Reserve Assets
assets.tooltip: Explore all assets in the Reserve and their transactions.

k-cur.title: kCUR
k-cur.description: The Kolektivo Reserve mints the Kolektivo Curaçao Reserve Token (kCUR) token by collateralizing KTT and other assets in the reserve.

token-info.title: Kolektivo Curaçao Reserve Token (kCUR)
token-info.tooltip: This is the content that will go into the tooltip of the kCUR token info card

pool.title: Primary Pool (kCUR-cUSD)
pool.tooltip: This is the tooltip for the Primary Pool (kCUR-cUSD) section

leverage.title: Leverage Ratio
leverage.tooltip: The ratio between the total supply of kCUR to the total value of Reserve Assets, over time.

trend.title: kCUR Price
trend.tooltip: The evolution of kCUR price over time.

supply.title: kCUR Supply Distribution Over Time
supply.tooltip: The total distribution of kCUR supply by allocation type over time.

risk.title: Reserve Risk
risk.description: This is a basic & accessible description that the public can read to understand what it is.

value-over-time.title: Reserve Value Over Time by Risk Class
value-over-time.tooltip: Tooltip for Reserve Value Over Time by Risk Class
value-over-time.over-collateralized: The reserve is over-collateralized. Some copy about why this matters.
value-over-time.under-collateralized: The reserve is under-collateralized. Some copy about why this matters.

k-guilder.title: kGuilder
k-guilder.description: What is kGuilder? Why does it exist? Which blockchain does it live on? Basic & accessible description for the general public.

token-info-card.market-cap-tooltip: Total value of all KTT existing.
token-info-card.current-price-tooltip: The current price of 1 KTT expressed in USD.
token-info-card.total-supply-tooltip: The total amount of KTT tokens existing.
token-info-card.supply-distribution-tooltip: The current distribution of tokens between Treasury, Reserve and Circulating Supply.

general.wrong-network-message: Your wallet is connected to {{connectedTo}}, but we need you to connect to {{need}}. Do you want to switch your connection to {{needed}} now?
